name: Mission Rescue City: Army Figh
description:
Mission Rescue City: Army Fighting is all about shooting and survival mission with your strategy. Use your sniper skills and shoot your target in shooting and will use multiple sniper guns with telescope in killer games.
Features:
- Unlimited challenging battle arenas
- Real gun games 3d environment
- Realistic gunner battle gun HD sound effects
- Superior gunner rifles
- Drive the battle tank or control the aircrafts
